org.jerkar.api.file

Class JkZipper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jerkar.api.file.JkZipper

  • public final class JkZipper
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines elements to embed in a zip archive and methods to write archive on disk.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  JkZipper.JkCheckSumer
      Wrapper on File allowing to creates digests on it.
      static class  JkZipper.JkCompressionLevel
      Specify compression level
      static class  JkZipper.JkCompressionMethod
      Specify compression method

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      JkZipper andEntryName(java.lang.String entryName, java.io.File file)
      Returns a JkZipFile identical to this one but containing also the specified entry.
      JkZipper andEntryPath(java.lang.String entryPath, java.io.File file)
      Returns a JkZipFile identical to this one but containing also the specified entry.
      JkZipper.JkCheckSumer appendTo(java.io.File archive)
      Append the content of this zipper to the specified archive file.
      JkZipper merge(java.io.File... archiveFiles)
      Returns a JkZipFile identical to this one but containing also the entries contained in the specified archive files.
      JkZipper merge(java.lang.Iterable<java.io.File> archiveFiles)
      Returns a JkZipFile identical to this one but containing also the entries contained in the specified archive files.
      static JkZipper of(java.io.File... dirs)
      Creates a JkZipper from an array of directories.
      JkZipper.JkCheckSumer to(java.io.File zipFile)
      Writes this zip definition to the specified file.
      JkZipper.JkCheckSumer to(java.io.File zipFile, JkPathFilter entryFilter)
      Same as to(File) but specifying a filter to exclude entries.
      JkZipper with(JkZipper.JkCompressionLevel level)
      Returns a JkZipFile identical to this one but with the specified compression level.
      JkZipper with(JkZipper.JkCompressionMethod method)
      Returns a JkZipFile identical to this one but with the specified compression method.

      • appendTo

        public JkZipper.JkCheckSumer appendTo(java.io.File archive)
        Append the content of this zipper to the specified archive file. If the specified file does not exist, it will be created under the hood.
